channel.title: OS on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in OS on Some Title

item.title: My os (Python)
item.description: Summary for yourself Update from time to time Sometimes the terms are wrong because I know myself ! View #command # Optional argument description What is #os used for? Is it a folder operation? Module loading import os #glob is a bonus import glob Frequent operations Get folder/file #Get current directory os.getcwd() #Get file name os.basename() #Get absolute path os.path.abspath() __file__ # path of the file being executed #Get folder name os.
